news.title: MOONSPELL To Release Their First-Ever Symphonic Concert As A Live Album This October
news.summary:
Moonspell will release their first-ever symphonic concert, Opus Diabolicum, held at Lisbon's MEO Arena, this October as a live album! 
 The post  MOONSPELL To Release Their First-Ever Symphonic Concert As A Live Album This October  appeared first on  Metal Injection .

news.title: DAVID ELLEFSON Says He'd Like To Join MEGADETH's Farewell Tour: "I'm A Founding Member"
news.summary: "I'm a Founding Member" of MEGADETH. "For things to flush out the way they did with me not being part of the final farewell of something I started, [it's] probably not something I'm super happy about"
